tool_description:
This is the master api to convert all files together in an array. For example you can send 3 photo, 1 gif, 3 songs, 2 video files, and you can convert to 50 versions in a single call as a bulk process. 

This is the most easy method if your APP has multiple media versions. It combines all other transcoding endpoints. 

 You can send multiple files with different formats. You can target multiple versions. (Like 360p and 1080p video outputs from the same video.) Object structure is same. 

Uplo...
name: C6- Multi Files Transcoder Photo, Audio, Video (MP4, HLS)
title: C6- Multi Files Transcoder Photo, Audio, Video (MP4, HLS)
tool_name: C6- Multi Files Transcoder Photo, Audio, Video (MP4, HLS)

api_list.name: C6- Multi Files Transcoder Photo, Audio, Video (MP4, HLS)
api_list.description:
This is the most easy method to convert multiple files at once. Just add all your files in an array. 
you must have AWS IAM user credentials with "putObject"
if you don't have, then check our A series APIs, they returns temporary download link. 
Please read the "introduction" section in the document for more info on our docs.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://c6-multi-files-transcoder-photo-audio-video-mp4-hls.p.rapidapi.com/apifsp/transcoder/transcode_and_upload_file"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "c6-multi-files-transcoder-photo-audio-video-mp4-hls.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
